member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.ApplicationRegistrations
member.summary: Contains extension methods for registering services.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.ApplicationRegistrations.AddMemoryLockingProvider(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection,System.Action{Sels.DistributedLocking.Memory.MemoryLockingProviderOptions})
member.summary: Adds a that uses an in-memory store to keep lock state. Provides distributed locking within the same application.
member.param: Collection to add the service registration to
Optional delegate for configuring the options

member.name: T:Sels.DistributedLocking.Memory.MemoryLockingProvider
member.summary: Provides application wide distributed locks by storing the locks in memory and making use of thread locks to handle concurrency.

member.summary: Contains configuration for the currnt instance.

Who is supposed to have the lock

member.summary: Assigns the lock to the caller of the request.

member.name: T:Sels.DistributedLocking.Memory.MemoryLockingProviderOptions
member.summary: Exposes configuration options for .

member.name: P:Sels.DistributedLocking.Memory.MemoryLockingProviderOptions.CleanupInterval
member.summary: The interval that will be used by to perform cleanup of the in-memeory locks to free up memory. When set to no locks will be cleaned up.

member.name: P:Sels.DistributedLocking.Memory.MemoryLockingProviderOptions.IsCleanupEnabled
member.summary: If cleanup of locks is enabled.

member.name: P:Sels.DistributedLocking.Memory.MemoryLockingProviderOptions.CleanupAmount
member.summary: The value to configure .

member.name: P:Sels.DistributedLocking.Memory.MemoryLockingProviderOptions.ThrowOnStaleLock
member.summary: Dictates how stale locks are handled. If set to true a or will be thrown when actions are performed on a stale lock. When set to false the action will fail silently.

member.name: P:Sels.DistributedLocking.Memory.MemoryLockingProviderOptions.ExpiryOffset
member.summary: How many milliseconds before a lock expires to extend the expiry date. Is also used as offset when to notify that a lock expired.

member.name: T:Sels.DistributedLocking.Memory.MemoryLockCleanupMethod
member.summary: Defines what memory locks are eligible to be removed when cleanup is performed.

member.name: F:Sels.DistributedLocking.Memory.MemoryLockCleanupMethod.Time
member.summary: Inactive locks older than the configured amount (in milliseconds) will be removed.

member.name: F:Sels.DistributedLocking.Memory.MemoryLockCleanupMethod.Amount
member.summary: When the total amount of active locks exceeds the configured amount, the oldest inactive locks will be removed until the total amount of locks is below or equal to the configured amount.

member.name: F:Sels.DistributedLocking.Memory.MemoryLockCleanupMethod.Always
member.summary: All inactive locks will be removed.

member.name: F:Sels.DistributedLocking.Memory.MemoryLockCleanupMethod.ProcessMemory
member.summary: All inactive locks will be removed when the memory usage of the current process exceeds the configured amount (in bytes)

member.name: T:Sels.DistributedLocking.Memory.ProviderOptionsValidationProfile
member.summary: Validation profile for validating .

member.param: Optional logger for tracing
